product_highlights: Multi-category pump specialist with precise dosing technology
Foamer pumps for enhanced user experience
Precise dosage capabilities for formulation accuracy
notes: Multi-category pump specialist with precise dosing technology. Offers treatment pumps (0.15-0.25ml precision), foamer pumps, and lotion pumps. Applications span personal care, skin care, sun care, and hair care. Precise dosage critical for active ingredients and pharmaceutical-grade formulations.
